name: simplelogin
tagline: An email aliasing service for protecting inboxes
description: SimpleLogin is an email aliasing and forwarding service that can be self-hosted or used as SaaS. It protects your real address using aliases, custom domains, and browser and mobile integrations.

features.title: Email Aliasing
features.description: Creates unlimited email aliases that forward to your real address

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manages aliases on iOS and Android with native applications

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Encrypts forwarded emails with your PGP key for enhanced privacy

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Organizes aliases into folders for different purposes or projects
